name: A spacial Easter
description:
---A spacial easter---
v.0.1

Controls :

Arrows, WASD/ZQSD or gamepad.

(+mouse in certains gamemodes)

You must do THE high score in this plateformer game which you need to collect eggs and go to next levels.

------------------------------

Know bugs :
-Menu music bug
-> Insert to stop all sounds

-Can't skip intro
-> reload the game
